website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Linchpin was meant to be an all-around running shoe for users who are casually active. Considering the make, the quality, the price and the features of the shoe, it seems to do the job in the all-around category. It can be a good choice if a moderately pronated runner is looking for a reasonably-priced stability shoe for road running, casual wear or light workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return my first pair because the rubber that ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return my first pair because the rubber that comes to the front of the toe came unglued in just over one month. Luckily Amazon helped me anyway and sent me a new pair. The second pair have held up really well to 12 miles of running a week for about 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: On the face of it they are supposed to be a step up from the Grid Cohesion in that they are claimed to offer better support/stability. They are priced significantly more
customer_reviews.text: Having used them for about 150 miles of jogging, these shoes are barely passable. I bought these after several decades of using the Saucony Grid Cohesion series. On the face of it they are supposed to be a step up from the Grid Cohesion in that they are claimed to offer better support/stability. They are priced significantly more. The support claim is true. But they run much smaller and much tighter than the Grid shoes. And they quickly develop tears in the cushion lining on the upper front near the last lace eyelet and tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Something is missing.
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff even after numerous runs. Something “signature” about Saucony is missing in this shoe. I am better off wearing these with jeans than with running shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Shrikant

product_meta.title: Saucony mens POWERGRID LINCHPIN-M Powergrid Linchpin
product_meta.description: A versatile ride for your all-around lifestyle, the Linchpin is a modest everyday trainer for the casually active. Lightweight materials and a hot melt overlay for support help make this ride quicker through the gait cycle. Plus, POWERGID cushioning in the heel provides a smooth landing when there's more pavement to pound.
